document_data.caption: A witherstench sits atop a rock, minding its own business.
document_data.name: Witherstench
document_data.mainbody: '''Witherstenches''', also known as '''skunk beasts''', were strange, monstrous relatives of the more mundane [[skunk]].
document_data.Description: These creatures had very little fur, with what little they did have being in the form of dirty patches. Their skin was a blotchy yellow and covered in tiny purple spots. On average their bodies grew to be {{SI|4|ft|long=yes}} in length.
document_data.Abilities: The tiny purple spots that covered the body of a witherstench constantly emitted a powerful, nauseating [[musk]] odor.
document_data.Combat: These creatures generally fought with their claws.

Ecology.Habitats: Witherstenches were primarily found in areas that were dank and filthy.
Ecology.Usages: A cup's worth of musk from a witherstench could be mixed in a broth with the blood of a [[green dragon]] to [[item enchantment|enchant]] the same type of dragon's [[dragon's tooth|tooth]].
